data.name: LicensingMessagesTitle

data.name: LicensingMessagesDescription
data.value: Contains localizable resources for Sitefinity messages related to the licensing.
data.comment: The description of this class.

data.name: InTrialMode
data.value: Sitefinity is running in Evaluation mode, because there is no valid license provided. Enter License Key to start using it in Licensed mode.
data.comment: Message shown in license info page.

data.comment: Message for license updateing connection problems.

data.value: The license will not be updated because
data.comment: Message shown in license info page when a licensing problem occurs during the lciense update

data.name: LicenseDataConfirmationHeader
data.value: Your Sitefinity license will be updated.New license details are:
data.comment: Message shown in license info page.

data.name: CurrentDomainNotInLicense
data.value: You are currently using Sitefinity from a domain which is not included in the new license.
data.comment: Warning shown in confirmation screen

data.comment: Warning shown in confirmation screen

data.comment: To run Sitefinity CMS you need to activate a valid license.

data.comment: Compare all editions

data.name: WhatTypeOfInstallation
data.value: What type of installation you want to use?
data.comment: What type of installation you want to use?

data.name: EnterEmailAndThePassword
data.value: Enter the email and the password from your Sitefinity.com account
data.comment: Enter the email and the password from your Sitefinity.com account

data.comment: If you have already a license file upload it here to activate it.

data.value: Use a license file you have downloaded
data.comment: Use a license file you have downloaded

data.name: IfYouNeedToExtend
data.value: If you need your trial period to be extended please, contact sales@sitefinity.com
data.comment: If you need your trial period to be extended please, contact sales@sitefinity.com

data.name: IfYouNeedToExtendHosted
data.value: If you want to extend the hosted trial period Purchase a renewal on our website or contact sales@sitefinity.com
data.comment: If you want to extend the hosted trial period Purchase a renewal on our website or contact sales@sitefinity.com

data.name: LicenseSavedSuccessfull
data.value: The license is updated. You are now using Sitefinity in licensed mode for the registered domains.
data.comment: Message shown in license info page.

data.name: LicenseNotSavedSuccessfully
data.value: The license will not be updated. The license data you have entered is not valid.
data.comment: Message shown in license info page.

data.name: LicenseIsUpToDate
data.value: Your license is current, no need to update
data.comment: Message shown in license info page when the license is current

data.name: MissingLicenseKey
data.comment: Message shown in license info page for the license key when the license is not ok

data.name: AddLicense
data.comment: Message shown in license info page, reminding to add a license , when such is missing

data.name: Update
data.comment: Update license button label

data.name: LicenseFileSaveProblem
data.value: The system was not able to save the license
data.comment: Message shown in license info page.

data.name: ServerWrongCredentials
data.value:
Incorrect email and/or password

If you need any help with licensing please, contact sales@sitefinity.com
data.comment: Incorrect email and/or password

data.name: ServerWrongNoAvailableLicense
data.value:
There is no license available for this edition

To be able to activate a license you need to purchase it first.
Login to your Sitefinity.com account to make a purchase.

If you need any help with licensing please, contact sales@sitefinity.com
data.comment: No license available

data.name: ServerMoreThanOneLicense
data.value:
More than one license is available for this edition

Login to your Sitefinity.com account, download the license file you want to use and activate it manually.

If you need any help with licensing please, contact sales@sitefinity.com
data.comment: More than one license available.

data.name: ServerConnectionProblem
data.value:
An error has occurred while trying to get the license from the licensing server

Please, contact sales@sitefinity.com for further assistance
data.comment: Connection problem
